main event: A UFO sighting was reported on July 17, 1955, in Canton, Ohio, where a gray, round dome-shaped object was observed ascending straight up and disappearing.
interesting points: The object was described as having a gray body with white on the top and bottom., The observer noted that the object was stationary before it abruptly moved upwards., The sighting was evaluated and concluded as a possible balloon., The object made no sound during the observation., The sighting lasted for about 10 minutes.
